name: Hidden Objects Christmas Magic Winter Holiday Time
name_original: Hidden Objects Christmas Magic Winter Holiday Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Christmas Magic is a beautifully designed seek and find game with 30+ Worldwide Winter themed levels.

Explore Xmas from Around the World in New York, Paris, London, Germany, Las Vegas, more! Search through Christmas Tree Farms, Santa’s Workshop, Christmas Morning, Winter Forests, Ski Resorts, Shopping Malls, Winter Wonderland Villages, Festive Neighborhoods with decorated Porches and more!

Find festive Christmas and Winter themed objects like Santa Claus, Rudolph, Snowmen, Reindeer, Christmas Lights, Stockings, Gingerbread Houses, Holly, Wreaths, snow covered Christmas Trees, Elves, Candy, Gingerbread Cookies, Ornaments, Dreidels, Presents, frozen Icicles, Snow Globes and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure through Winter season is sure to mystify!

Hidden Objects – Christmas Magic features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Christmas & Winter Graphics
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
